title: [INTERVIEW] Why Tenstorrent CEO Jim Keller isn't worried about Nvidia
text: Tenstorrent CEO Jim Keller Samsung Electronics CEO hints at second-gen Mach AI chip SM Entertainment founder Lee Soo-man invests $5.2 million in AI startup Mindlogic SK hynix to break ground on mega chip cluster next March Amcham presses Korea for forward-thinking AI regulations Micron's upbeat results drive tech stock rally in Korea Hyundai Motor to add Nvidia in-vehicle system to all cars [INTERVIEW] Korea's Sapeon looks to chip away at Nvidia's market share Intel takes fight to Nvidia with Core Ultra release, AI accelerator Hyundai, Samsung add to Tenstorrent's $100M fundraise Samsung Electronics to supply HBM3 to Nvidia To write comments, please log in to one of the accounts.
